name: Entrepreneuship Communication
long_desc: This class will give students framework for and practice in communication skills for entrepreneurial careers. Longer description coming.

custom_fields.goals: Understand and apply frameworks for analyzing audiences needs Adapt and apply techniques for communicating successfully in different professional settings Develop own communication style and professional persona
custom_fields.key_topics:
Using persuasive techniques, including audience analysis and storytelling, to achieve the following:
-- Deliver technical information to broader audiences
-- Synthesize and summarize information effectively for different audiences
-- Engage audiences in person and remotely
-- Develop their own professional personas
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Presentations, brief written assignments, interactive exercises
custom_fields.relevance: Prepare for careers as entrepreneurs and innovators
